root: ^Hey there, Ghost! Back for a visit.
^Oh, it's you again! Thanks for stopping by.
^No problem. Just wanted to see how you're doing.
^Thanks to you, I'm feeling much better.
^It's nice to know my family is thinking of me.
^They miss you a lot, you know.
^But they understand if you're not ready to visit them yet.
^Yeah, it's still a bit scary for me. But I appreciate your help.
^Take your time. And if you ever need anything, I'm here.
^Thank you, friend. You're always welcome here.
